thread.title: NOPD: Gunmen rob armored truck workers near Fairgrounds
thread.title_full: NOPD: Gunmen rob armored truck workers near Fairgrounds - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: NOPD: Gunmen rob armored truck workers near Fairgrounds
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - New Orleans police are investigating an incident where three gunmen robbed armored truck workers at a bank near the Fairgrounds. The incident occurred Sunday afternoon in the 1400 block of North Broad Street.
Police say that the three gunmen approached the workers, who were filling the bank's ATM machines. The gunmen, who were dressed in black, took an unknown amount of money. Responding officers chased the suspects through a nearby neighborhood, but the gunmen were able to escape.
If you have any information that could help police with this case, you are asked to call Crimestoppers at 504-822-1111.
